content: **errata round 2 8 popcornstitches instead of 7 ** made a little heart for a charity project started by stefania a finnish girl see the group crochet hearts for charity i hope that everyone who downloads this pattern will make a few hearts for stefania s project the project aims to raise awareness on the issue of seniors loneliness if you send hearts from a non eu country write gift for charity project on the envelope otherwise stefania has to pay customs
